title: Legislatures in the UK and Mexico

content.prompt: In comparing the legislatures of the United Kingdom and Mexico, which of the following statements is true?

choices.label: In both countries, the lower house is popularly elected.
The upper house in each legislature has greater power than the lower house.
Women are more likely to be elected to the British legislature than the Mexican legislature.
Both legislatures select the head of government.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
